typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		societe as string,
		region_lib as string,
		sgeo as string,
		sgeo_lib as string,
		agence as string,
		agence_lib as string,
		dep_ag as string,
		frs as string,
		article as string,
		article_lib as string,
		dm as string,
		ref_frs as string,
		{vva (m) n} as string,
		{vva (m) n-1} as string,
		{qte (m) n} as string,
		{qte (m) n-1} as string,
		{vva (c) n} as string,
		{vva (c) n-1} as string,
		{qte (c) n} as string,
		{qte (c) n-1} as string,
		{var. vva (m)} as string,
		{var. qte (m)} as string,
		{var. vva (c)} as string,
		{var. qte (c)} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ECOULEMENT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
rename derive(yearmonth = replace(split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[1], "-", ""),
		canal = split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[2],
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonthANDcanal
ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> yearANDmonth
yearANDmonth filter(!isNull(agence_code)) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIDNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
posIDNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt� vente directe})) ~> deleteVentesDirectes
ECOULEMENT select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code = agence,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file = frs,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ref_frs,
		qte_ecoulement = {qte (m) n},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(Article) || isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
deleteVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = ConditionalSplit1@qteNotNul@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
marquename select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = societe,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		HubSAPid,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
Union1 derive(marque_name = "SaunierDuval",
		marque = "1604",
		marque_num = "1604") ~> marquename
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Filter1
yearmonthANDcanal split(qte_ecoulement!=0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(qteNotNul, qteNull)
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TEREVA_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TEREVA_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@qteNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['terevaQteNull.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> terevaQteNull
